name: tardigrades/sexy-field-api
description: This package adds api functionality to sections.

suggest.tardigrades/sexy-field: Without the base package this api is nothing
suggest.tardigrated/sexy-field-entity: You need entities, yes you do
suggest.tardigrades/sexy-field-doctrine: You might want to use doctrine for persisting data
suggest.tardigrades/sexy-field-form: The api requires you to use form
